actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the marriage or remarriage of a beneficiary shall not terminate his or her entitlement to benefits or reduce the amount thereof.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that the remarriage of a widow, widower, parent, child, or wife shall not terminate his or her entitlement to incurrence benefits or reduce the amount thereof.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the marriage or remarriage of a beneficiary shall not terminate his or her entitlement to benefits or reduce the amount thereof.
